```{r}
path = "/Users/zain/Desktop/School/Reg_Proj/Regression_proj/dsProject_Z/Master.csv"
idf = read.csv(path) 
```
```{r}

# Identify the index of the "isFraud" variable
isFraud_index <- which(names(idf) == "isFraud")

# Remove any categorical variables with only one level
idf <- idf[, sapply(idf, function(x) length(unique(x))) > 1]

# Move the "isFraud" variable to the end of the data frame
idf <- idf[, c(1:(isFraud_index - 1), (isFraud_index + 1):ncol(idf), isFraud_index)]

# Fit the logistic regression model
m1 <- glm(isFraud ~ ., data = idf, family = "binomial")
```
